CustomField.description: When Status = Mobilisation return Pending + Active Annual Revenue, when Terminated return Active at Termination Annual Revenue. For all other statuses return Active Annual Revenue.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Status__c, "Mobilisation", Pending_Annual_Revenue__c + Active_Annual_Revenue__c, "Terminated", Active_at_Termination_Annual_Revenue__c, Active_Annual_Revenue__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Note: Actual Values do not include Pending Line Items outside of the Mobilisation Contract Status.
CustomField.label: Actual Annual Revenue
